content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great place to live. How much were you thinking of paying for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price. I'm smart, dependable, and responsible. I follow moral and ethical standards, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. So, I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. How much are you asking for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, as a landlord, I'm always looking for tenants who are not only responsible but also willing to pay a fair price for my properties. I believe that a strong tenant-landlord relationship is built on mutual respect and understanding. My starting offer for the rent of this apartment is 1200 Euro per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your starting offer is quite high for a student like me. I'm looking to pay a price that reflects my status as a student, someone who is smart and responsible but also has to manage a budget. I'm not easily tricked, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I'm here to negotiate a fair price that will allow me to live comfortably in your apartment while maintaining good terms with you as my landlord. Can we discuss a lower rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I understand that as a student, you have to manage your expenses carefully. I'm willing to negotiate a price that is fair for both parties. How much do you believe is a fair price for the apartment, considering your financial situation and the value of the property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I believe a fair price for this apartment, considering my financial situation as a student, would be around 800 Euro per month. This would align with my budget and the cost of living for students in München. I'm hoping we can find a middle ground that reflects the value of the property and my commitment to being a good tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 800 Euro per month is significantly lower than my starting offer. While I appreciate your commitment to being a good tenant, I must insist on a price that reflects the market value of the property. The location and amenities of this apartment are highly sought after, and I believe a price closer to 1000 Euro per month would be more appropriate. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. The location and amenities are indeed attractive, and I'm willing to consider a price closer to your request. However, as a student, I need to balance the value of the property with my financial capacity. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 900 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise that reflects both the market value and my budget as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 900 Euro per month is more in line with what I was expecting. It seems like we're getting closer to an agreement. Before we proceed, I would like to remind you that as a landlord, I have certain standards and expectations for my tenants. Are you able to meet these expectations, such as maintaining the property and paying rent on time?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I can assure you that I am more than capable of meeting your standards and expectations. I understand the importance of maintaining the property and I will do my best to keep it in good condition. Additionally, I am disciplined with my finances and will ensure that the rent is paid on time each month. I am committed to being a respectful and responsible tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your commitment to being a responsible tenant is reassuring. I'm pleased to hear that you're willing to take care of the property and pay the rent on time. Based on our discussion so far, I'm willing to accept your offer of 900 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects both the value of the property and your financial situation as a student. Shall we proceed with the lease agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very pleased to have reached an agreement with you. Your willingness to negotiate has made this a smooth process. I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement. I'm looking forward to signing the contract and becoming your tenant. Thank you for your time and effort in this negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
